item.title: TIP: Viewing Any PDF Online, Without A PDF Reader And For Free
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Just a small tip. If you want to view a pdf and you don’t have adobe acrobat (or any other pdf reader) installed, e.g., you are sitting in a cyber cage or at a friend’s place, you can still view it. Only thing you have to do is, just prefix the url to the online pdf with “http://www.scribd.com/vacuum?url=” and you’ll see a nice web interface rendering your pdf without having to install anything on your PC.
